name: Banana in the Dark
description:
"What place is this? Why is it so dark? Why am I a glowing banana?" - You, asking the questions that matter.

Take advantage of a power outage to escape the facility you're on. Use the fireflies' energy to open the gates to your freedom!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

LEFT/RIGHT: MOVE

UP: JUMP

DOWN: POINT FLASHLIGHT DOWN

SPACEBAR: TURN FLASHLIGHT ON/OFF

V: TOOGLE SCREENSIZE (640x480 / 1280x960)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was developed during LUDUM DARE 39 jam.
